::Spears::

She fianlly made it to the transport pod.
"Well, it's not the prettiest thing I've seen, but it will suffice."
She got in and entered the coordinants for the Ark into autoflight 
systems.  She buckled in and watched the pod take off. 

After a few hours, the pod landed on the outskirts of Tibet.
She programmed the pod to return to it's original docking station, 
jumped out of the pod and watched it take off, headed for North 
America.

She walked along the main roads, headed for the Ark.
